message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CE, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.Distributed Systems. 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the use of High Performance Clusters and Cloud Computing for scientific applications, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The paper also discusses the monitoring and prediction of application execution time, which falls under the category of Computer Engineering and Hardware (cs.CE). The use of Cloud Computing also involves networking and communication, which falls under the category of Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the adaptation and auto-scaling of the application, which falls under the category of Software Engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper discusses the use of heterogeneous environments, which falls under the category of Distributed Systems (cs.Distributed Systems).
